entry.title: LED Ceiling Light Fixture - Warm and Cool White Light cULus listed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 26.99

  • UL LISTED SUPER BRIGHT LED LIGHT - 50 LEDS: This ceiling light is listed by cULus and Energy Star, a recognition for performance and quality. At 1050 lumens provided by 50 white light LEDs, the light has 80+ CRI and is one of the brightess LED light fixtures in the market. Turns into full brightness at once.
  • EVEN LIGHT DISTRIBUTION & NO GLARES: This elegant and round design enables a 130 degree view angle, combined with the light output from 50 individual LEDs, the light has no glare. The seamless display of light emulates natural lighting and is easy to look at.
  • LONG LIFE AND ENERGY SAVING: The LED lights are rated at 25,000~ hours lifetime at LM80. There will not be a constant need to replace bulbs. This 15W light is comparable to a traditional 60W light in terms of output. At 60lm/W, the efficacy is considerably higher than most competitors.
  • EASY INSTALLATION: This flush mount light enables for very easy installation. Standard ceiling light wiring and surface mount with screws. Works with any LED dimmer switch.
  • IDEAL FOR INDOORS: Bedroom, living room, hallway, basement, garage, stairway, porch, office or any other commercial or residential application is able to use this ceiling light fixture.
